_header: First when men ne world was non / Then was no thing…
Title(s): De incepcione hominis narracio ; Northern Homily Cycle
_description: De incepcione hominis narracio, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: First when men ne werld was naneþan was no thing bot god allane…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …To haue þat life oure lord vs lenThurgh prayer of his moder Amen
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.288-290.
